reviewText:
First I saw this on cable TV - in the very beginning of that medium. Then it was scarey
and quite odd - with the Hermes knifeledsna -
which leads to the final knifebattle against the
houdlum Mitry.  Iron nose and the dwarf is least
a bounch of a**jokes with deranged minds!
The gangster is knifed right in his houdlum
heart for murdering the women journalist.
Fair and square! The little man, her former  fiance, triumphed by getting his vengence
and just revenge!
It was in a foreign language
